FuncDef:
The remote-id command configures the remote ID for an IKE peer.
The undo remote-id command cancels the configuration.
By default, the remote ID for an IKE peer is not configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the ID of the peer.
It is a string of 1 to 255 case sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo: Do not run this command if the IKE peer ID is in the IP address format.
